document_data.mainbody:
The MerrowdrinkersGiven the lack of any merrow for hundreds of miles of the Goblin Marches, and their lack of drinkability, it is presumed that this is a spelling error and the intended name is Marrowdrinkers. were a tribe of hobgoblins in the Goblin Marches in the 14 century DR.
The Merrowdrinkers had an alliance with the Neidlig goblin tribe, and settled close to Neidlig Citadel.
